title: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company reports PAT of Rs 524 crore for third quarter - Economic Times
content: Cholamandalam Investment and Finance Company reports PAT of Rs 524 crore for third quarter  Economic Times
description: Total income for the quarter under review on a standalone basis was at Rs 2,530.22 crore as against Rs 2,504.86 crore registered in the same period last fiscal.
